## createWidget

Creates a new widget.

```
POST /widgets
(widget)
--- 201 Created
(widget)
```

| request | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| widget | [Widget](Widget.md) | The widget to create. |

| response | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| widget | [Widget](Widget.md) | The created widget. |
